SELECT c.id as id, content, time, updated_time, article_id, v.username as username, v.comment_id as comment_id FROM comment as c LEFT JOIN vote as v ON c.id = v.comment_id WHERE article_id=#{article_id} and id=#{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(content, time, updated_time, article_id, username) VALUES (#{content}, now(), now(), #{article_id}, #{username})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM vote WHERE id=#{id} and username=#{username}
